title: Bridge Over Troubled Water
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When you're weary
And feeling small
When tears are in your eyes
I will dry them all
I'm on your side
Oh, when times get rough
And friends just can't, can't be found
[Chorus]
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will lay me down
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will lay me down, yeah
[Verse 2]
When you're down and out
Or when you're on the street
When evening falls so hard
I will comfort you
I'll take your part
Oh, when darkness comes
And pain is all, all around
[Chorus]
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will lay me down
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will lay me down, hey, hey

[Verse 3]
Sail on, silver girl, yeah
Sail on by
Your time has come to shine
All your dreams are on their way
See how they shine
And if you ever need a friend
Look around, I'm sailing right, right behind
[Chorus]
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will ease your mind
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will lay me down
[Outro]
Hey, hey, hey
I will lay me down
